unnormalised: India finished with 7 medals at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics, including 1 Gold, 2 Silver and 4 Bronze; their best performance to date. Neeraj Chopra's Javelin throw measured 87.58 m.
normalised: India finished with seven medals at the two thousand twenty Tokyo Olympics, including one Gold, two Silver and four Bronze; their best performance to date. Neeraj Chopra's Javelin throw measured eighty seven point five eight meter.
